description: How to find approved training providers (ATP) for Boat Master Licence (BML) training.

attachments.title: BML Personal Survival and Water Safety
BML Personal Survival and Water Safety (Restricted)

details.body:
MCA BML approved ancillary safety training providers

Below are documents which provide contact details of the training centres providing BML ancillary safety training for fire safety, first aid and personal survival and water training.

BML Fire Safety

  • BML Fire Safety (PDF, 37.1 KB, 3 pages)
  • BML Fire Safety (Restricted) (PDF, 33.1 KB, 2 pages)

BML First Aid

  • BML First Aid (PDF, 28.9 KB, 1 page)
  • BML First Aid (Restricted) (PDF, 32.8 KB, 2 pages)

BML Personal Survival and Water Safety

  • BML Personal Survival and Water Safety (PDF, 31 KB, 2 pages)
  • BML Personal Survival and Water Safety (Restricted) (PDF, 33 KB, 2 pages)

MCA Accepted Equivalent to BML Approved Ancillary Safety Training

  • Acceptable equivalent training (PDF, 91.7 KB, 1 page)
